content: Floor semirings are almost ready. @Filippo A. E. Nuccio, do you also need a generalization of fract? We currently only have int.fract which is for ordered rings.
No, for the project I was working on, that would be enough: thanks!

Great! Then #9591 and #9592 should be enough. Can you just check that you don't need the nat version of docs#int.ceil_add_int and its floor variants (cf end of #9592)? I didn't manage to generalize those.
